Contact Details: Sophie John (ONS) and John Broggio (PHE)  cancer.newport@ons.gov.uk  +44 (0) 1633 456935
Description: 1-year cancer survival by Clinical Commissioning Group for all-cancers combined, three cancers combined, breast, colorectal and lung. 1-, 5- and 10-year index of cancer survival estimates are also available by Sustainability and Transformation Partnerships and Cancer Alliances.
Name: Index of cancer survival for Clinical Commissioning Groups in England: adults diagnosed 2001 to 2016 and followed up to 2017
Notes: The landing page provides links to 2 data sets  Cancer survival in England, with 95% confidence intervals, Tables 10 to 16 and Cancer survival in England, with precision estimates, Tables 1 to 9.
Route from landing page to data: Data can be located by clicking on he links under data.  each link will open another web page.  Scroll down to your download option and select current to locate the XLS spreadsheet.
Sizing Notes: Simple table structure with footnotes, % and numbers but differences between the tables and datasets.
